name: LAKE PLACID ASSOCIATION FOR MUSIC DRAMA & ART INC.
description: Nonprofit live performing and visual arts center
firms: SPINNAKER GOVERNMENT RELATIONS FKA C.H. FISHER LLC
sampleDescriptions: Support for arts appropriations and Community Project Funding requests.
Secured meetings and scheduled site visits regarding a potential Community Project Funding request for fiscal year 2025.
Advocated in support of an upcoming FY2025 Community Project Funding request. Supported a rule change in the House to allow arts nonprofits to apply for Community Project Funding.
Submitted a Community Project Funding request to the New York delegation. Supported a rule change in the House to allow arts nonprofits to apply for Community Project Funding.
Submitted and advanced a Community Project Funding request to the New York delegation.
